channel.title: Hands-on Learning on Proftsec
channel.description: Recent content in Hands-on Learning on Proftsec

item.title: Building an AI-Powered Cybersecurity Risk Matrix: From Logs to Actionable Risk Scores
item.description: A hands-on guide for students and professionals to build a lightweight AI-assisted tool that translates log events into risk scores using a cybersecurity risk matrix.

item.title: The Rise of Medusa Ransomware: What Students and Organizations Need to Know
item.description: A breakdown of the Medusa ransomware threat, with a hands-on educational lab simulation to help cybersecurity learners understand its methods, impacts, and how to respond.
